tool_description: Aggregated hourly data for Spanish electricity prices "Precio voluntario para el pequeño consumidor" (PVPC).
name: PVPC hourly Spanish energy prices API
title: PVPC hourly Spanish energy prices API
tool_name: PVPC hourly Spanish energy prices API

api_list.name: electricity price  - daily average
api_list.description:
Returns JSON with price average for the day that matches the timestamp in the given zone.
Returned "time" object is  l o c a l time in the given zone.
   
Parameter 1:
number - timestamp: in s e c o n d s unix time U T C
if timestamp is 0, current local time for the zone will be used
   
Parameter 2:
String - zone: either peninsular, canarias, baleares, ceuta or melilla
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/price-average/0/peninsular"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/price-average/{timestamp}/{zone}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: electricity price (daily)
api_list.description:
Returns JSON with price data for the day that matches the timestamp in the given zone.
Returned "time" object is  l o c a l time in the given zone.

Parameter 1:
number - timestamp: in s e c o n d s unix time U T C
if timestamp is 0, current day for the zone will be used

Parameter 2:
String - zone: either peninsular, canarias, baleares, ceuta or melilla
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/price-daily/0/peninsular"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: electricity price (hourly)
api_list.description:
Returns JSON with price data for the hour that matches the timestamp in the given zone.
Returned "time" object is  l o c a l time in the given zone.
   
Parameter 1:
number - timestamp: in s e c o n d s unix time U T C
if timestamp is 0, current local time for the zone will be used
   
Parameter 2:
String - zone: either peninsular, canarias, baleares, ceuta or melilla
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com/price/0/peninsular"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pvpc-hourly-spanish-energy-prices-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
